mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ehr_db.eci_surgery_note( surgeryId, emrId, patientId, patientNo, hospitalId, deptId, bedNo, surgeryName, surgeryDoctor, surgeryAssistant1, surgeryAssistant2, surgeryDate, updateTime,syncTime,syncFlag, anesthesiaDoctorName, anesthesiaDoctorUuid, surgeryAssistant1Name, surgeryAssistant1Uuid, surgeryAssistant2Name, surgeryAssistant2Uuid, surgeryDoctorName, surgeryDoctorUuid )VALUES( #{surgeryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{emrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{patientId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{patientNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hospitalId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{deptId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{bedNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{surgeryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{surgeryDoctor,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{surgeryAssistant1,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{surgeryAssistant2,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{surgeryDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{surgeryBeginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{surgeryEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{incisionGroup,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{incisionHealLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rawAnesthesiaWayId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{anesthesiaWayId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{anesthesiaDoctor,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{anesthesiaWay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{preOperativeDiagnosis,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operativeProbe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operativeMeasures,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operativeSituation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opCode}, #{woundClosureWay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{incisionBandagedWay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inhospitalId}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime},NOW(),1, #{anesthesiaDoctorName}, #{anesthesiaDoctorUuid}, #{surgeryAssistant1Name}, #{surgeryAssistant1Uuid}, #{surgeryAssistant2Name}, #{surgeryAssistant2Uuid}, #{surgeryDoctorName}, #{surgeryDoctorUuid} )
